pullrequest.title: Pimpl'ize Visual and all derived classes

content.raw:
This is looking good. I noticed that there were a few un-needed class declarations still remaining in the header files. So I started removing them, and then started changing what files are included, and so on. It's in 913da218e472 if you're interested (branch visual_pimpl_scpeters).

EDIT: just started a [jenkins job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-quantal-amd64-gpu-nvidia/244/) for my changes.
